room.name: Starter Tavern
room.description: You appear in a dark, smelly tavern. You can't pick out any specific conversation amongst the cacophony, but you're sure it's there. The exit to the street is to the west. What looks like a door to a storeroom is to the north.

room.name: Main Street
room.description: You turn on to Main Street. There isn't much traffic this time of day. To the east is a loud, smelly tavern.

room.name: Storeroom
room.description: You quietly sneak into the storeroom. It is lined with the skulls of sacrificed animals. There is a pentagam painted on the floor in blood. You wonder what exactly is in the meat pie. To the south is the door back into the main Tavern.
